### Radon Testing Research Study
#### Notice of Contract Award
##### Solicitation Number: 1000243709
##### Publication Date: 2022-09-23
##### Closing Date: 2022-10-07T12:00:00
---

Health Canada requires a contractor to produce an annual consumer report on commercially available electronic radon testing devices, as well as conduct a study on the placement protocol for radon testing devices in multi-unit residential buildings in Canada.

**Objective**
The objective of this contract is to gather information which will be used to review testing guidelines, recommendations, and protocols regarding the use of radon testing devices.

**Essential Details**

* Estimated duration: Contract award until March 31, 2023, with option periods until 2026
* Estimated quantity of commodity: N/A
* Regions of delivery: National Capital Region (NCR) in Canada

**Procurement Information**
* Solicitation method: Competitive bidding process
* Notice type: Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)
* Trade agreements: Applies to contractors from countries with which Canada has a Free Trade Agreement (FTA)
* Trade agreements include: Canada-Panama FTA, Canada-Korea FTA, Canada-Colombia FTA, Canada-Chile FTA, and Canada-Honduras FTA

**Contractor Information**

* Contracting entity: Health Canada, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K9, Canada
* Contact person: Sami Nouh, [sami.nouh@hc-sc.gc.ca](mailto:sami.nouh@hc-sc.gc.ca), 613-941-2102

**Document References**

* Official documentation can be accessed at [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca)
